headline: Organizations

action.delete_confirmation:
Deleting an organization is only possible if there are no users related to this organization.
Are you sure you want to delete the organization "{{name}}"?

delete.label: Delete organizations
delete.confirmation:
Deleting an organization is only possible if there are no users related to this organization.
Are you sure you want to delete the {{count}} selected organizations?

merge.label: Merge organizations
merge.description: Select the organization to which the selected organizations should be merged.

error.duplicate_organization_name: An organization with the default name is still existing. Please rename or delete that one first.
error.general: An error occurred while adding the organization. Please try again.
error.network: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

deletion_confirmation_question:
Deleting an organization is only possible if there are no users related to this organization.
Are you sure you want to delete the organization {{name}}?
